website_summaries.verdict: The comfortable, DJ-focused SMS Audio Street by 50 DJ headphones deliver powerful audio for deep bass lovers, but like most celebriphones, they're overpriced.
pros: Powerful audio with serious deep bass response
DJ-oriented design with flip-away ear cups
Ships with two cables, one with inline microphone and remote
cons: Highly sculpted frequency response not for purists
Ear cups don't flip away from ears as quickly as typical DJ models

customer_reviews.title: Terrible QC issues.
customer_reviews.text: It's sad because the quality - sonically - is amazing. After my 30 days the headphones snapped off the rail of the left ears. I tried tightening the screw but it was as if the hole was stripped. If you got a good pair - these are worth it however, this is not what you should expect from a company that are toting these as highend headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Torres

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I am a party dj and have used all types of headphones. Sound wise: these are pretty good but structurally they are terrible. I have had these for a little over a month and last night at a gig, the arch snapped in half. This is the second pair of this brand I've had that have snapped like this. I will no longer be purchasing this brand. Of all of the headphones I've had, I have never had any snap in half on me.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones if you like real music.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! They are not over based out like Beats. You can tell that they have been tuned in a studio. Classical music is great coming out of these....you can hear each instrument clearly. I'm glad that these can be had for less than 80 bucks if you look online. Save hundreds and get these instead of the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Williams

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my Wired DJ Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I heard it went out of business, so I'm worried about warranty... I own the sport wireless ones and I did have to exchange them with the warranty way back... BUT for the price Wired DJ Headphones are nice. I like using them while I'm on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin E. Dunning

customer_reviews.title: really great dj headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best dj headphones..... since i like house music, dubstep.. these go great even with hip-hop and rap music. The price is unbeatable especially since i got it for 100$ and 4.95 shipping..... its really worth it because the original price is 300$ plus tax... great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Kerwin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound til they SNAP.
customer_reviews.text: They sounded good. Up until they snapped on my head. All I did was put them on and the middle snapped. This happened after having them for 3 months
customer_reviews.author: joe stacey

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY..
customer_reviews.text: After two days of using them, they snapped, it seems that there are other reviews with the same issue, just took them off my head and they cracked.. Disputing UPDATE 1... They will be sending a replacement, will update once they get here... UPDATE 2... After a few weeks, they snapped again.. sending them back
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good base, clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Good base, clear sound, comfortable, easy to carry, suitable price But i dont like :- Bad cable, it cuts quickly and disconnect songs from time to time with no reason. Maybe not fits well on iohone 6, Plastic material looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound poor materials
customer_reviews.text: They broke and ive only had them for a week and a half. The sound quality is good but the build quality is crap
customer_reviews.author: Rui Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Needs more durable material.
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is ok but the durability is poor. The headband crack on the second day I put the headphones on. I did nothing extreme I simply just put the headphones on and the headband cracked just from simple use.
customer_reviews.author: dilladog

customer_reviews.title: great sound. satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Snugg fit.great sound.satisfied. Beats are best but these are a good runners up 👍
customer_reviews.author: DeAngelo Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lovin it!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've had in a while. Very happy on the price as well. Hope to buy another pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Wendolina30

customer_reviews.title: Very Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/2015 my son broke my original headphones so I bought another pair. These are quality headphones! I have a pair of Sync by 50 headphones but i couldn't resist getting the street by 50 Dj headphones they are almost perfect. The ear pads are more plush than the Sync. The headphones fold which is good for storage. They have a bit more weight than the sync which I actually like. As for the sound it seems to have a bit more bass than the Sync but the Sync has a tad bit more clarity. Overall I'm very pleased with these no charging required just plug into your music device and go. Great looks to.
customer_reviews.author: Mozzer101

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these a few years ago and they are starting to come apart from daily use. I purchased this new pair and as soon as I took them out the box, they fell apart at the folding joints. Thanks to Amazon's great customer service, I sent back next day for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats by Dre
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. Would definitely recommend! The price is well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele1964

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and comfortable to wear, I do have concerns about the build quality as the center band cracks when ear pieces are adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Came Two Day Earlier And Sound Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They came in the mail two days early and just opened them up and sound amazing for the price to you cant beat it especially what you get with them to overall very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Awesome Head Phones!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to beats by dre their isn't no comparison. Reason why i say that is because. When i have had those head phone one side would go out as well as my other DJ friends. BUT, These SMS AUDIO are unbelievable with sound and clairty. A Plus is finally having headphones thats after a complete year both sides still work and louder than ever. My dream head phones...
customer_reviews.author: DJ SPARK

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Better than beats in my opinion i ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Better than beats in my opinion i have both beats and these sms' are way better in the build quality the sound and its base is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: L. M

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just Ok. Returned within a week because it didn't give the quality of sound that a 200 dollar pair of headphones should.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Powell

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but junk for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound good but junk for the price, I already have had a screw come loose and had to fix them I should send back honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Merritt

customer_reviews.title: designed poorly - disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these less than 6 months ago and they are already broken. The top band that goes over my head and cracked in 4 places and they are no longer tight enough to stay on my head. The problem is that the top bad is solid plastic and there is no give. I don't have that large of a head but I had to stretch then a little to get them off without pulling my earings and POP, the first crack happened and it was downhill from there. Truly disappointing, I expect much better quality for something this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: The product is comfortable, but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: The product is comfortable, but a little heavy. It shuts out enough noise so I can tolerate my Zumba teachers blaring music--but not all sound..
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The earphone cracked on my second fay using them. Im very disapointed and unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RAFAEL RAMBLAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase will last a while
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I'm really happy I purchased this headset very good quality amazing noise isolation comfortable for a good hour to 2 hours but will feel fatigued later very durable haven't broken them yet and they've been thrown violently when traveling good sound quality when recording nice packaging kinda stealthy due to the Matt finish so it doesn't draw too much attention just a really good purchase very recommended
customer_reviews.author: cristopher

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed headband
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, very poorly manufactured. The headband snapped after only 3 days of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Deaven Marie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Looks like from putting over my ears proved too much stress ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long, broke in two places. Looks like from putting over my ears proved too much stress for the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kent A. Mc Heard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones very durable and has more bass then Dre Beats headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: They met my expectations, however I didn't expect they would have been so heavy. However I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound better than the beats by Dre.
customer_reviews.text: For the sale price of 79.99, this is a must get.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: It's a great headphone, I had 2 pairs of beats by ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headphone, I had 2 pairs of beats by dre and they cracked. Sms is more durable and worth the money. It's overall a better headphone .
customer_reviews.author: Dajion

customer_reviews.title: Made me smile😃
customer_reviews.text: The feeling of walking down a long congested noisy street to your own sound track w/ no outside interference is priceless. This is what this product brings! Peace of mind. Out of all the SMS audio products, I highly suggest you just get these. They look great, snug on the ears & serves as an escape to the outside world. DO NOT GET BEATS! Go w/ sound quality and price, not a trend.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this product for a good quality of sound, you will be pleased. It's nice to wear and the sound is great. I use this headphone with my iPhone, using my personal albums. I love the dept of the music.... Also the passive noise cancellation is just great. Good product. Only the plastic cover could be better. The service of Amazon is great. Friendly people.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: design and sound are very good. Thank you. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: won dongmin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I tried these because they were on sale ($194). I thought I was going to return them but i was really impress. The build quality is top notch, better than other brands like Beats. Sound quality, bass was not over powering that makes it possible to listen to other genre of music. I listen to rap and indie and i love the way they sound.
customer_reviews.author: MusicHead

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price although I was missing my mirco cleaning cloth and I had to tighten the hindges but all and all great product
customer_reviews.author: Amar

product_meta.title: SMS Audio STREET by 50 Cent Wired DJ Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingTake it to the street. Bring your music with you in luxurious style with STREET by 50 DJ Headphones. Detachable mic cord for tangle free street wear and transport, plus enhanced bass and ultra plush memory foam earpads ensure a comfortable ride no matter where your music takes you. The STREET by 50 wired headphones feature professionally tuned 40mm driver, professional studio quality sound, high-end styling, enhanced bass, soft memory foam cushions, and passive noise cancellation. The STREET by 50 DJ headphones are currently available in 2 colors: shadow black and city grey. Each STREET by 50 DJ headphone includes: removable cable with mic, carry case (soft), airplane plug adaptor, soft touch cleaning cloth, owners manual, and product brochure. SMS Audio was developed by international recording artist, actor, and philanthropist Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson as the next step in the evolution of personal audio technology. More than simply headphones, SMS Audio allows you to experience the power of music on your own terms. Smart, stylish and comfortable, these devices provide you with an escape into the lush world of professionally-tuned, acoustically perfect music...anywhere, anytime, and any way you want to hear it. Beware of counterfeits, only purchase SMS Audio products from Authorized Resellers. Only quality products from Authorized SMS Audio Retailers carry the full SMS Audio warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The STREET by 50 Pro Performance DJ headphone is here and you won't be disappointed. With two detachable cords (one for making phone calls, and a coiled DJ cord for extra length and durability), easy folding hinges, and rotating ear cups, this DJ Pro Performance model is just right for the DJ in all of us. Throw in enhanced bass and ultra-plush memory foam leather ear pads, you can spin away in the club for hours and hours. Once you're done, fold these up and protect them in the included hard shell carry case.

Soft memory foam ear pads for comfortable wear All SMS Audio products carry a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Beware of counterfeits; only purchase SMS Audio products from Authorized Resellers. Only quality products from Authorized SMS Audio Retailers carry the full SMS Audio warranty.

PROFESSIONALLY TUNED 40MM DRIVERS
The custom 40mm driver with professionally-tuned sound signature gives you studio-quality sound for demanding audio applications. The sound signature of STREET by 50 has been professionally engineered to deliver a more pure, warm, and balanced sound to ensure you hear your music as the artist originally intended, no matter the genre--from rap to rock, jazz to classical. 

THUMPP ENHANCED BASS
An enhanced bass feature called THUMPP brings a new level of warmth and low-end to your favorite music. Enjoy extra punch and deep, powerful beats in a stylish headphone that goes wherever you do.

ROTATING EAR CUPS
The ear cups rotate for studio monitoring, DJ performances, and more.

Custom 40mm drivers and foldable design. View larger PASSIVE NOISE CANCELLATION
The closed-style design of the STREET by 50 DJ Headphones provides passive noise cancellation, with soft, Quiescent PNC memory foam cushions that help decrease outside noise and are comfortable for long periods of wear.

IN-LINE MIC AND TANGLE-FREE CABLE
The tough, tangle-free cord is detachable for easy storage and transport, while the 3-click in-line microphone lets you take calls and control music playback from your smartphone or other portable device. A traditional, coiled DJ cable is also included.

FOLDABLE DESIGN
STREET by 50 On-Ear Heaphones feature a foldable hinge design, making it easy to carry with you or pack into a bag or luggage.

GO WHERE THE MUSIC TAKES YOU
STREET by 50 DJ Headphones are ready to go wherever you are, with an included soft drawstring carrying case and a 1/4" adapter for stereo audio jacks. It's a versatile audio solution to enjoy your favorite music anywhere and everywhere.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
SMS Street by 50 DJ Headphones, carry case, coiled DJ cable, removable cable with 3-click mic, 1/4-inch adapter, soft touch cleaning cloth, owners manual, product brochure.


CHOOSE YOUR STYLE

STREET by 50 In-Ear Headphones 
SYNC by 50 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones 
STREET by 50 Over-Ear Headphones 
STREET by 50 On-Ear Headphones
